column3: Apple grants activist one of three wishes BOSTON/SAN FRANCISCO Apple Inc's board relaxed some rules for director nominations by outside investors but stopped short of broader changes sought by an activist shareholder. ~Apple can sell iPhone 7s in Indonesia after R&D; investment commitment JAKARTA Apple Inc has committed to invest around $44 million in a research and development center in Indonesia over the next three years
column5: enabling it to start selling its latest iPhone 7 in the Southeast Asian nation. ~
